name: Yulia Kanapatskaya
short_description: 15+ years delivering large-scale web platforms, with end-to-end ownership across frontend systems, full-stack execution, and technical leadership supporting products used by millions worldwide
about: Frontend platform & system architect with 15+ years of experience leading UI infrastructure and full-stack systems in high-scale, multi-product environments. Specialized in design systems, frontend platforms, and modernizing legacy systems into scalable architectures. Strong at translating product vision into executable technical plans while balancing delivery, quality, and long-term maintainability. Core Technologies: React, TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js, NestJS, GraphQL, Redis, gRPC, Docker, AWS.

highlights.title: 15+ Years of Experience
highlights.desc: Building and scaling production web systems

highlights.title: Impact
highlights.desc: Systems used by teams and millions of users

content.content: I'm a Staff-level frontend and full-stack engineer with 15+ years of experience building and scaling web products across startups and large consumer platforms. My core strength is technical leadership as an individual contributor — designing frontend platforms, shared systems, and scalable architectures while staying deeply involved in implementation. I've worked across high-impact product teams in the U.S. and Europe, contributing to systems used by millions of users.

At WeTransfer, I led frontend platform architecture, including a multi-package design system adopted across five products and used by 30+ engineers, supporting applications with 1M+ DAU. I remained hands-on through code contributions, pull request reviews, and architectural guidance, while partnering closely with product and platform teams. More recently, I stepped into a Technical Engineering Manager role, expanding my scope into planning, prioritization, and delivery — while continuing to contribute directly to the codebase.

My focus is on technical management roles where leadership is grounded in hands-on engineering. I'm intentionally growing toward managing systems, scope, and delivery while remaining an active Staff-level individual contributor. I'm looking for a long-term role with room for growth and meaningful equity participation.
Frontend expert specializing in scalable platforms, shared UI systems, and design systems
Technical leadership across architecture, delivery, and long-term system evolution
Hands-on full-stack engineer (frontend-first, with active backend contributions)
Experience leading modernization efforts across complex, legacy codebases
Growing focus on technical management while remaining close to the code

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Systems Engineering
education.university: Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radio-electronics

contact_text:
I'm currently considering Senior, Staff, or Principal IC roles where I can stay hands-on as a full-stack engineer with deep React expertise, while growing toward technical management responsibilities over time.

I'm looking for a long-term environment with equity, where architectural ownership, product thinking, and people development are valued.
